name: Brothel Simulator 🍓
description:
Welcome to Brothel Simulator, where your goal is to earn enough money to purchase all of the scenes in the gallery. In order to do this, you must master the art of pleasing your clients by teaching your ladies their desired fetishes and keeping track of your regular customers.

If you are up for a challenge, you'll be sure to have a fulfilling and rewarding experience as you work towards your goal of purchasing all of the scenes in the gallery.

Clients have specific desires that must be fulfilled to keep them satisfied
Players can train their ladies in different fetishes to improve their chances of satisfying clients
